https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ci5A9TPmNajMxt1L8p4KlZ76sc9.jpg Four of the West's most infamous outlaws carry out a daring bank heist in the gold-rush town, Bath Water. As the posse takes chase, things take a turn for the worse, as the bandits realize they've been double-crossed - but by who? A Fistful of Lead
